title: What in the Wordle?
description:
A deceptively easy game for burnt-out pandemic shut-ins. Vox's Aja Romano explains. 
Read Aja’s story: https://www.vox.com/culture/22891192/wordle-game-what-is-wordle-why-is-it-so-popular-how-to-play
Today’s episode was produced by Victoria Dominguez, engineered by Paul Robert Mounsey and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.

itunes:title: What in the Wordle?
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: Wordle helps us feel like we’re being social when we’re really not. Perfect!
